Chapter 4: Hidden Motives and Mechanics Learning Dramas We have talked about the Zeta involved with humans at this time who act in violation of universal law, which dictates brotherhood and cooperation. You exist within a free-will universe and because of this freedom there is much greater leeway of experience than in other systems that operate upon a formatted structure of predetermined action.
